page.title: 03Calton and Hanlith
page.content: {Calton}is about 1 mile out of Airton up a very steep,very narrow,twisting road.It is only a hamlet and has approximately 10 occupied houses,although more are being developed,several from barn conversions. Calton has no public amenities and is not on any public transport route.however,it must have been more important once because of "Calton Hall". {Hanlith}is approximately 3/4 of a mile out of Kirkby Malham.However,the road linking the 2 is very narrow and is often impassible in Winter. Hanlith consists of only 6 families,2 of whom farm. Hanlith has no public amenities at all,although it does have a manor house in Hanlith Hall.
